oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Excerpt from consolidation interview with Charles Galbreath, May 2, 1995
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: An excerpt from an interview with Charles Galbreath, conducted on May 2, 1995 by Carole Bucy as part of the Metro Consolidation Oral History Interviews. Galbreath discusses his role in the consolidation of the city and county governments. He also comments briefly on other individuals and their contributions. The complete record of the interview is available at the Metro Government Archives.
